title: Absolutely Stunning and Upscale Community, in the Heart of ATX!
posting_body: Property Listing# 1503
Located in the eclectic Rainey Street neighborhood, residents are just a short distance to all that Austin has to offer.
Nearby boutiques, markets, shops and restaurants -- a true cafe lifestyle right outside your door!
Quick and easy access to IH-35,  as well as Mopac, 290 and 71, as well as 183!
Apartment Features:
Open floorplans with 9' ceilings
Floor-to-ceiling windows with upgraded solar shades
Hardwood flooring in kitchen, living, and dining areas
Granite countertops with subway tile backsplashes and espresso-finished cabinets
Stainless steel appliances with double door refrigerators and smoothtop ranges
Spa-styled baths with ceramic tile floors and fixture surronds
Granite topped bath vanities with custom lighting
Kohler fixtures in kitchens and baths
Generous closet space
Built-in shelving and desks
Community Features:
Rooftop pool with amazing views of downtown Austin & Lady Bird Lake
Poolside terrace with outdoor TVs and fireplace
SkyLounge with areas for entertaining, playing billiards, relaxing or working.
Expansive fitness center with cutting edge cardio, training, and TRX equipment
Wi-Fi lounge and coffee bar
Onsite concierge services available
Controlled access parking garage
Walking distance to downtown Austin
Anchors Rainey Street, Austin's most eclectic shopping and dining district
Call today and check this community out!
